The buying center
Buying decision process
(Interpersonal and individual influences)
(Organizational influences)
summary_markdown: This table outlines the key elements of the buying center and the buying decision process. The buying center encompasses individuals and groups involved in the purchase decision. The buying decision process is influenced by both interpersonal and individual factors, as well as broader organizational influences. This structure suggests a multi-faceted approach to understanding how purchasing decisions are made, considering both the human element within the buying center and the contextual factors of the organization.
